Name: assign_user_story_to_one_sprint
Description: Each user story is assigned to at most one sprint

Name: limit_sprint_capacity_by_velocity
Description: Story points in a sprint do not exceed team velocity

Name: team_to_one_project
Description: Each team is assigned to exactly one project

Name: worker_to_at_most_one_team
Description: Each worker belongs to at most one team

Name: each_team_has_one_scrum_master
Description: Each team has exactly one Scrum Master supporting it

Name: po_manages_one_backlog
Description: Each Product Owner manages exactly one Product Backlog

Name: feature_in_backlog_if_in_release
Description: A selected feature must appear in some Product Backlog

Name: epic_in_backlog_for_user_story
Description: A scheduled user story must belong to an epic that is in a Product Backlog

Name: task_only_if_user_story_in_sprint
Description: A task is assigned only if its user story is scheduled in some sprint

Name: resolve_blocker_if_task_selected
Description: If a task is selected, at least one of its blockers must be resolved

Name: budget_allocation_within_limit
Description: Allocated budget per project cannot exceed project budget

Name: activate_sprint_if_has_user_stories
Description: A sprint is active if and only if it has at least one scheduled story

Name: review_only_if_sprint_active
Description: Sprint reviews can be scheduled only for active sprints
